item.title: Version 0.0.8
item.description: - Added a focused App Expose cartesian harness profile (Finder + TextEdit) with machine-readable artifacts and deterministic scenario IDs for gate/cancel reliability testing. - Hardened Dock click targeting in cartesian runs with cached/revalidated icon points and per-click down/up bundle probes to distinguish hit-test misses from trigger failures. - Fixed negative-space cancel tracking reset so consumed/non-Dock clicks clear App Expose tracking state correctly and reduce stuck cancel flows. - Added recovery for consumed click-up paths by posting passthrough synthetic mouse-up events, reducing Dock icons getting visually stuck in a pressed/greyed state.
